Question: Like many budding starlets this person picked up radio work to earn side income as well as gain exposure.
Hints: This person met and eloped with Cuban bandleader Desi Arnaz in 1940.
When the young this person was caught admiring herself in it she was severely chastised for being vain.
In 1940, this person met Cuban-born bandleader Desi Arnaz while filming the Rodgers and Hart stage hit Too Many Girls.
